      • closestPointOnGreatArc

        public static SGVec_3d closestPointOnGreatArc​(SGVec_3d p1,
                                              SGVec_3d p2,
                                              SGVec_3d hoverPoint)
        returns the point on the great arc p1 <-> p2 to which hoverPoint is closest. If the point does not lie on the great arc p1 <-> p2, returns whichever of p1 or p2 is closest to hoverPoint.
        Parameters:
        p1 -
        p2 -
        hoverPoint -
        Returns:

      • raySphereIntersection

        public static int raySphereIntersection​(sgRay ray,
                                        double radius,
                                        SGVec_3d S1,
                                        SGVec_3d S2)
        Find where a ray intersects a sphere (centered about the origin)
        Parameters:
        ray - to test against sphere
        radius - radius of the sphere
        S1 - reference to variable in which the first intersection will be placed
        S2 - reference to variable in which the second intersection will be placed
        Returns:
        number of intersections found;
